snippet.title: Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard LIVE Week 2 day 1
snippet.description:
Were back for week 2 and we will be here the entire time offering commentary and showing you the footage from inside the courtroom. We got this.

Live coverage is back as we watch the defamation trial that is taking place in Virginia US. The case is being fought out between 2 of Hollywood's celebrities, not withstanding the superstar of this trial Johnny Depp.

Depp is suing his ex wife Amber Heard for 50mil dollars, and Amber is counter suing for 100mil dollars. Some notable names who will be testifying include Walter Hamada the President of Warner Bros and Elon Musk to name just a couple.

As this trial gets underway for week 2, we can only imagine this is only going to get more intense as the weeks go by. Our live coverage here will help keep you entertained.

#johnnydepp #amberheard
tags: johnny depp vs amber heard trial
